title: 'TÁR' Is the Movie of 2022. Here’s Why.
description:
Sean and Amanda dive deep into one of the year’s most exciting and resonant movies, Todd Field’s ‘Tár' (1:00). Then, Field joins Sean to discuss the world of classical music, Cate Blanchett, and how he made the film (1:27:00).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Todd Field
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
